es.mityc.javasign.trust

Class AllUntrusted

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.mityc.javasign.trust.TrustAbstract
      • es.mityc.javasign.trust.TrustAdapter
        • es.mityc.javasign.trust.AllUntrusted
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ITrustCRLEmisor, ITrustOCSPProducer, ITrustSignCerts, ITrustTSProducer

    public final class AllUntrusted
extends TrustAdapter

    Manager de absoluta desconfianza.

    Se da por inválidos todos los elementos. Clase de test.
